title: Close but no Cigar?

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So Graves's cigar was given back not long ago. At least to some servers.

And I distinctly remember seeing it just the other day in loading screen, because my friend pointed it out excitedly.

But in my most recent game _(post 7.10)_, it wasn't there anymore. 
Whats up with this?

Is this a bug? 
Or have we been deemed unworthy like other servers? _(pretty sure we don't have those laws though)_

replies.body: Ladies and gentlemen, let's have a round of applause for OP's masterclass in autism.

Forgive my ignorance.
I assumed that once you give someone back a cigar, they would then _have_ said cigar. 

Would you care to elaborate?

> I assumed that once you give someone back a cigar, they would then *have* said cigar. 

Maybe Graves just finished it and hasn't gotten his hands on another...
I think he'd be manly enough to just stick a shotgun shell in his mouth as a substitute! ;)
What's so autistic about asking a change in detail?
Care to explain why this is autistic?

Hmph, then you have my client, where Graves is still entirely without his fix (I mean it both literally and figuratively) on every corner of the game.

Please fix, Riot.

graves currently has 2 assets on once, with and without, the game just picks them at random and uses them, so you might not have it in loading, but your kill icon will etc etc. or vice versa, or not at all, or with every part of it
